Articles.Content:
http://www.firstmenonthemoon.com/

Very awesome website if you want to totally geek out and follow the conversations on the way to the moon. Gives you some cool tips for landing on Mun too - first tip have 5 guys stand behind you following the script on the site.

Hover over any acronyms and technical terms for an overview of what they mean etc. geek out.

You can get the transcripts of Mercury Gemini and Apollo missions from JSC.

http://www.jsc.nasa.gov/history/mission_trans/mission_transcripts.htm
